title: Configuration of an L2 Packet Forwarding pipeline

name.description: name of the pipeline, must be set to l2fwd

fakedrop.description: whether to actually drop unmatched packets (False) or send them immediately to the output port (True) for correct rate measurements

upstream-table-size.description: number of entries in the upstream MAC table

downstream-table-size.description: number of entries in the downstream MAC table

fluct-table.description: number of MAC table entry update events (table-update) per sec
